HomePage.heroSubtitle: Create a stunning wedding website with interactive guest features, RSVP management, photo sharing, and everything you need to plan your perfect day.

features.sectionTitle: Everything You Need for Your Special Day
features.sectionSubtitle: "The Big Day" offers a suite of tools to make your wedding planning seamless and your celebration unforgettable.

customizableWebsite.title: Customizable Website
customizableWebsite.description: Choose from elegant templates and personalize every detail of your wedding website.

rsvpManagement.title: RSVP Management
rsvpManagement.description: Easily track guest responses, meal preferences, and plus-ones in real-time.

photoSharing.title: Photo Sharing
photoSharing.description: Allow guests to upload photos and create a beautiful shared gallery of memories.

giftRegistry.title: Gift Registry Links
giftRegistry.description: Integrate your gift registries and make it easy for guests to find your wish list.

guestListTools.title: Guest List Tools
guestListTools.description: Manage your guest list, seating arrangements, and communication effortlessly.

themeEditor.title: Theme Editor
themeEditor.description: Match your website to your wedding's color scheme and style with our intuitive editor.

playlistCollaboration.title: Playlist Collaboration
playlistCollaboration.description: Let guests suggest songs and help create the perfect soundtrack for your celebration.

easySharing.title: Easy Sharing
easySharing.description: Share your wedding website link with guests via email, social media, or printed invitations.

templates.sectionSubtitle: Choose from our collection of professionally designed templates. Personalize with your photos, colors, and content to create a unique wedding website.
templates.previewSheetDescription: This is a preview of the {name} template.
templates.previewNotAvailable: Preview not available for this template.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Choose the plan that works best for your wedding celebration.

basicPlan.name: Basic
basicPlan.description: Perfect for intimate celebrations with core features.

premiumPlan.name: Premium
premiumPlan.description: Comprehensive features for the perfect celebration.

deluxePlan.name: Deluxe
deluxePlan.description: For large weddings with all premium features.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Hear from couples who created memorable wedding experiences with The Big Day.

0.quote: The Big Day made our wedding planning so much easier! Our guests loved the interactive features, especially the photo sharing during the reception.
0.author: Sarah & Michael

1.quote: The RSVP management saved us so much time and stress. We loved how easy it was to track everything in one place, and our guests found it super convenient.
1.author: Jessica & David

2.quote: The playlist voting was a hit! Our DJ loved having input from our guests, and it created the perfect atmosphere. The photo gallery is a beautiful keepsake.
2.author: Emma & James

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Creating your dream wedding website is simple and takes just a few minutes to get started.

0.title: 1. Sign Up & Create
0.description: Create an account and select your favorite template to customize your wedding website.

1.title: 2. Add Your Details
1.description: Add your wedding information, photos, and manage your guest list all in one place.

2.title: 3. Share & Celebrate
2.description: Send invitations, collect RSVPs, and enjoy all the interactive features with your guests.

demo.title: See a Live Demo
demo.description: Explore a fully featured demo wedding website. Experience both the guest view and the powerful admin dashboard.
demo.imageAlt: Wedding website demo on a laptop

cta.title: Ready to Start Planning <primary>The Big Day</primary>?
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and begin creating the wedding website of your dreams. It's free to get started!

HomePage.appFooterBrandSlogan: Create beautiful wedding websites to share your special day with family and friends.
